name: Obscura Digital
tagline: A Creative Studio for Big Thinkers
description:
Obscura is a creative studio headquartered in the heart of San Francisco’s Dogpatch district. Since 2000, we have created one-of-a-kind immersive experiences worldwide.
With a team of 60 full-time artists and technologists, our work transforms physical spaces to inspire and connects deeply with and inspires their audiences.  Our clients are pioneers: forward-thinking corporations, cultural dignitaries, and global change makers.
